name: Personal Information Protection Law of the People's Republic of China
provider: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of the PRC
use_case: Comprehensive personal data protection law governing the collection, storage, use, processing, transmission, provision, and disclosure of personal information.
data_summary: Requires purpose limitation, data minimization, user consent, and security controls with additional rules for sensitive and cross-border data.
compliance_materials: Cross-border data transfer security assessment filings
monitoring: Mandates ongoing monitoring of personal data processing and cooperation with regulatory inspections.
emergency_plan: Requires incident response and user notification for personal information security incidents.
obligations: Obtain valid user consent and provide transparent processing notices.
Adopt organizational and technical measures for data security and access control.
Conduct impact assessments for sensitive processing, automated decision-making, and cross-border transfers.
penalties: Fines up to RMB 50 million or 5% of annual revenue; potential suspension of services and personal liability.
